text:
="preserve">A Kinder Joy is an egg-shaped candy. It was first released in 2001 in Italy. It has 2 cocoa balls, milk cream, and chocolate on the bottom on one side. On the other side, it has a spoon on the top of the outside of it and a toy.
On November 13, 2017, it was announced that it will be released in the United States in the next week after that.
